findings.description: Trusted provider of end-to-end digital supply chain services. Industry's largest provider of end-to-end solutions that modernize the factory, optimize the warehouse, revolutionize the retail experience and reimagine field services and last mile delivery.
findings.ownership: Independently operated portfolio company of Sole Source Capital, Inc. (Santa Monica, CA)
findings.experience: Over 35 years of supply chain, field mobility and retail services expertise
findings.core_solutions: Managed mobility, mobile workforce, RFID, enterprise mobility, managed services, printing, software and mobile data capture solutions

negative_themes: High employee turnover and very low morale
Nepotism and cronyism is rampant - only 'favored ones' receive advancement
Hard work and customer service dedication means little to management
PE-owned, multiple waves of layoffs kept quiet by management
Essential employees laid off with work dumped on others
CEO described as elusive, only seen in town halls
critical_quotes: Employee turnover is high and morale is very low
Nepotism and cronyism is described as rampant
Multiple waves of layoffs with management keeping it quiet rather than being transparent
Essential employees being laid off with their work dumped on others
The CEO is described as elusive, with most people only seeing or hearing from him on town halls

positive_mentions: Easy to use for all associates with easy training
Helps with ease of inventory and ability to help customers faster
negative_mentions: Troubleshooting with issues and IT support
g2_findings.note: Some reviewers offered nominal gift card for completing reviews

findings.customer_base: Fortune 500 customers, local and regional customers throughout North America and Europe
findings.pricing_visibility: None - no pricing on website, custom enterprise pricing implied

findings.partner_relationship: Zebra Technologies Premier Partner (reseller and implementer, not competitor)
findings.positioning_note: Premier Partner with Zebra creates partner-competitor ambiguity

recent_developments: 60,000 sqft facility in Littleton, MA launched April 2025

18 companies now operating under Peak Technologies brand: VisionID, Siena Analytics, ISG Technologies, Coridian, Miles Data, Inovity, Supply Chain Services, Bar Code Direct, Avalon Integration, DBK, North Coast Technical, Graphic Label
New partnership with B2M Solutions announced
Energous partnerships with Annukin, Ecobyte, Peak Technologies
findings.blog_content: Connected autonomy and last-mile delivery focus
findings.content_cadence: Limited - not prominent blog/thought leadership presence

findings.pe_firm: Sole Source Capital (founded 2016 by David Fredston, Santa Monica, CA)
findings.strategy: Roll-up consolidation play creating scale advantage

homepage_messaging.primary: ROI-driven, customizable managed mobility technology services that ensure your mobile workforce operates effectively, efficiently, and with ease
homepage_messaging.secondary: Industry's largest provider of end-to-end solutions that modernize the factory, optimize the warehouse, revolutionize the retail experience and reimagine field services and last mile delivery

value_proposition_analysis.quantified_outcomes: None visible on homepage or public materials
value_proposition_analysis.differentiation: Managed mobility services with 24/7 support, particularly Zebra devices

high_priority: Internal customer metrics (NPS, retention, upsell rates)
Actual pricing models and deal sizes
Employee retention data and turnover rates

research_confidence.explanation: Strong public data on ownership, revenue, employee sentiment, and competitive landscape. Limited visibility into internal metrics, customer outcomes, and strategic decision-making.
